title: Vaaradhi Portal
description: Saved 20 hours weekly by developing Vaaradhi Portal (MERN) for an NGO. Streamlined data entry and paperwork for donors, caretakers, and students.

title: Book Talks
description: Developed a feature-rich book talks application using the MERN stack, allowing users to add reviews and ratings to books, enhancing community engagement and providing valuable insights.

title: Real-time Code Editor
description: Developed a real-time code editor using React, Node.js, and Express.js. Implemented Web Sockets using socket.io for real-time collaboration, Added feature for creating rooms for multiple users to work on the same code simultaneously.

title: Workout Tracker
description: Developed a workout tracking application using React, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. Implemented authentication and authorization using JWT.

title: VConnect Globe
description: Developed a fully responsive landing page for Vconnectglobe, a startup specializing in 1‑2‑1 mentorship for students aspiring to study in foreign universities.
